[kanaka+pabbata]
[ကနက+ပဗ္ဗတ]

Kanakapabbata：A mountain near Sankassa．There King Arindama questioned the Buddha Sumangala about nirodha，and eighty crores of beings realised the Truth．



The mountain came into existence as a result of Arindama’s good fortune．v．l．Kañcanapabbata．Bu．v．13； BuA．129．
